name: 2025 The 8th International Conference on Data Storage and Data Engineering
content: Publication: Submitted papers will be peer reviewed by conference committees, and accepted papers after proper registration and presentation will be published in the International Conference Proceedings Series by ACM (ISBN: 979-8-4007-1039-1), which will be submitted for indexing by Ei Compendex, Scopus, etc.
organizers: Nanjing University of Aeronautics and Astronautics, China
